Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Peter Obi ekeleela ndị Naịjiria ọkachasị ndị pati ọhụrụ ya bụ Labour Party, dịka ọ zọtara ọkọlọtọ pati ahụ iji zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuliaka 2023.

N'okwu nnabata o kwuru mgbe o meriri ntuliaka imeụlọ ha mere, Obi kwuru na oge eruola mgbe a ga-etighachị Naịjiria n'aka ndị nwe ya - gụnyere ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị nkuzi na ụmụakwụkwọ, ndị ọrụ aka, ndị ọrụ, ndị ọrụ larala ezumiike nka nakwa ndị Naịjiria ndị ọzọ na-amaghị ebe inye aka ha ga-esi bịa.
Ihe i kwesịrị ịma maka Labour Party nke Peter Obi wụbara
Lee ndị Igbo pụtara ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjiria
BBC Igbo Town Hall Meeting: Tinubu akaala nka ịzọ ọkwa onyesiala- Pete Edochie, Uche Nworah na ndị ọzọ
O kwuru na ọ ghọtara na ije a ga-abụ nke a ga-agbakọta aka eje, nke ndị ọkachasị metụta - ndị ntorobịa - ga-eso hụ na e jere.
Obi nwetara vootu iri itoolu na isii (96) n'ime 98 a tụrụ n'ọgbọ ebe a nọ mee ntuliaka imeụlọ nke ndị Labour Party.
N'agbanyeghi na Pat Utomi rituru n'iso zọọ ya bụ ọkwa, o nwetere otu vootu n'ime ya bụ vootu 98 a tụrụ.
Ebe foto si, Labour Party Facebook

Egwu adagharịala na ntuliaka imeụlọ otu labour Party na-eme taa n'Asaba, Delta steeti, dịka otu nwaanyị so azọ ọkwa onye ga-efere Labour Party ọkọlọtọ bụ Olufolahan Olubisola Emmanuel-Tella na ntuliaka onyeisiala tinyerela Peter Obi aja na garị.
Labour Pati họrọburu Peter Obi dịka ndị ọzọ nile so azọ rituru iji nye ya ohere ka o fee ọkọlọtọ Labour Party.
Ihe ndị mere ọtụtụ ụmụ Naijiria ji hụ Peter Obi n'anya
Mmadụ anọ so na-azọ ọkwa ahụ bụ: Ọkammụta Pat Utomi, Sampson Uchenna Charles, Faduri Oluwadare Joseph na Olufolahan Olubisola Emmanuel-Tella.
Emmanuel-Tella bụ nanị nwaanyị na-azọ ọkwa ahụ na Labour Party gbara isi akwara na a ga-emerịrị ntuliaka iji họpụta onye ga-efe ya bụ ọkọlọtọ, kama irituru Peter Obi ka ọ bụrụ onye nwetara ya.
N'ihi nke a, Labour Party ekwela ka steeti niile họpụta mmadụ anọ maọbụ ise ga-anọchite anya (delegates) ma tụọ vootu.
Peter Obi
Mara na otu pati 'Labour Party' nyeburu Peter Obi ikike dịka onye ga-azọrọ ha ọkwa onyeisiala na 2023, dịka ndị niile pụtaburu ịzọ ya bụ ọkwa rịtuburu ya.
Pat Utomi na-azọbụ ọkwa ahụ wepụrụ onye ya ma kwado Peter Obi.
Ebe foto si, Labour Party Facebook
Otu pati 'Labour Party' enyela Peter Obi ikike dịka onye ga-azọrọ ha ọkwa onyeisiala na 2023.
Nke a mere n'ọgbakọ imeụlọ nke Labour Party hiwere n'Asaba, isi obodo Delta steeti taa maka ịhọpụta onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala.

Cheta na Peter Obi bụ aka chịburu Anambra steeti si Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) wụba Labour Party n'ụbọchị 27 nke ọnwa Mee 2022, dịka o kwuru na ọtụtụ ihe ndị na-emegasị na PDP ugbua mere o jiri raa ya ahụ ịga n'ihu isonye na pati ahụ.
Ọ hapụrụ PDP n'ụbọchị 25 ma banye Labour Party na 27 nke ọnwa Mee, 2022.
